HomePage.title: Redha AlRamadhan
HomePage.description: Software Engineer & Product Manager. I build high-performing mobile and web applications, bridging the gap between technical development and strategic product vision.
HomePage.overview: With over 5 years of experience in the world of mobile and web development, I specialize in using technologies like Flutter and Next.js to create intuitive and high-performing digital experiences.
HomePage.career: My unique background as both a Software Engineer and a Product Manager allows me to not only build robust applications but also to guide them from concept to launch, ensuring they meet both user needs and business goals. I thrive in fast-paced environments, turning complex challenges into elegant, user-friendly solutions.

dngx.title: Software Engineer & Product Manager | DNGX Solutions
dngx.description: Leading the development of mobile and web apps using Flutter and Next.js. I manage the product lifecycle, define technical specifications, and act as the key liaison between the development team and stakeholders.

debrah.title: Software Engineer & Division Head | Debrah
debrah.description: Developed and maintained a suite of three flagship mobile apps. Architected a scalable microservices backend with Node.js and Docker, and played a key role in improving code quality and system stability.

BlogsPage.title: Blogs
BlogsPage.description: I write about my experiences and learnings in the world of mobile and web development.
